product_overview: eBazer is a full-featured e-commerce platform designed to deliver a seamless shopping experience via a React-based user storefront, a Node.js backend API, and an administrative dashboard. It supports user authentication, product management, order processing, and provides real-time admin statistics.
core_goals: Enable secure and efficient user authentication and registration.
Provide comprehensive product catalog browsing, searching, and detailed viewing.
Facilitate order placement, tracking, and history for users.
Offer an administrative dashboard delivering key business metrics and management capabilities.
Support a scalable architecture with modern tech stack including Node.js, React, and MySQL.
Ensure ease of deployment and setup with documented scripts and manual processes.
key_features: User Authentication and Authorization with JWT, password hashing, and roles (admin, customer).
Product Management APIs supporting listing, searching, pagination, and detailed product data including multi-language and multi-attribute support.
Order Management with creation and listing endpoints supporting coupons and multi-item orders.
Administrative Dashboard API providing real-time statistics for business insights.
Modern frontend implementation leveraging React 18, TailwindCSS, and Shadcn UI for the user site; static admin panel built with HTML, Alpine.js, and TailwindCSS.
Comprehensive database schema with seeded test data for users, categories, products, and orders.
Support for caching layer with Redis to improve performance where applicable.
user_flow_summary: User Registration: New users can create an account via the registration API, providing name, email, and password.
User Login: Registered users log in to obtain JWT tokens for authorized API access.
Browsing Products: Users can search, filter, and browse product listings with pagination support.
Viewing Product Details: Users select a product to view detailed information including multi-language names and images.
Order Placement: Authenticated users add products to cart and submit an order with optional coupon codes.
Order History: Users access their past orders and status through order listing API.
Admin Dashboard Access: Admin users authenticate and retrieve dashboard statistics for business overview.
validation_criteria: User authentication endpoints correctly register and authenticate users, enforcing password hashing and JWT issuance.
Product listing endpoints return accurate paginated, filtered results including multi-language and JSON attribute fields.
Order creation endpoint validates input, stores order and order items correctly, and applies coupon codes if valid.
Dashboard statistics endpoint returns accurate and up-to-date metrics for admin users.
Frontend components correctly integrate with backend APIs following documented base URLs and API prefixes.
Seeded data imports successfully populating database with test users, categories, products, and orders.
System runs correctly with the provided startup scripts, environment dependencies and technologies as described.
